publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4462 Mr Jamie Stone: Impact of Water Rates on Charities—That the Parliament notes with concern the impact of the liability to pay full water rates incurred by charities which did not occupy their premises prior to 1999; notes that many charities simply cannot afford this size of bill, and believes that the Scottish Executive should examine ways of assisting charities facing this kind of difficulty.

S2M-4462 Mr Jamie Stone: Impact of Water Rates on Charities—That the Parliament notes with concern the impact of the liability to pay full water rates incurred by charities which did not occupy their premises prior to 1999; notes that many charities simply cannot afford this size of bill, and believes that the Scottish Executive should examine ways of assisting charities facing this kind of difficulty.
S2M-4462 Impact of Water Rates on Charities (lodged on 30 May 2006) Nora Radcliffe*, Donald Gorrie*
S2M-4462 Impact of Water Rates on Charities (lodged on 30 May 2006) John Swinburne*
